item.title: Trump admin live updates: Trump says no US ground troops will be sent to Ukraine
item.description: President Donald Trump told "Fox and Friends" on Tuesday that there will be no deployment of American ground troops to defend Ukrainian territory.

item.title: Air Canada to gradually resume flights after reaching settlement with union
item.description: After multiple days with 10,000 flight attendants on strike, Air Canada has struck a deal with the union to resume its operations.

item.title: WATCH: Air Force plane flies through eye of Hurricane Erin
item.description: The U.S. Air Force released footage showing one of its planes entering the eye of Hurricane Erin.

item.title: Immigrant families fear Trump's deportations as children return to school
item.description: Attendance has fallen in some school systems since the crackdown began.

item.title: WATCH: Skunk rescued after getting stuck in bowl at skatepark in Pennsylvania
item.description: A man used a skateboard attached to a dog leash to lift a skunk to safety after the critter got stuck inside a bowl at a Pennsylvania skatepark.
